text: Like the Labor Day table, our hearts gather loved ones near and far.
The warmth of Labor Day embraces both present and absent hearts.
Labor Day blessings connect us to those we hold dear, wherever they may be.
Like workers' hands, love guides us to those we miss.
The Labor Day gathering welcomes both present guests and absent friends.
Like labor's fruits, our hearts reach for those who can't be here.
Labor Day joy multiplies when shared with those we love and miss.
Like workers' spirit, love reaches both near and far.
The Labor Day spirit connects hearts across any distance.
Like labor's reward, love reaches those we can't embrace.
Labor Day memories bridge the gap between present and absent loved ones.
Like workers' pride, love carries thoughts to those far away.
The Labor Day celebration nourishes both body and soul, near and far.
Like labor's strength, love watches over those we miss.
Labor Day peace embraces both present company and absent friends.
Like workers' unity, love brings light to absent hearts.
The Labor Day spirit unites hearts across any distance.
Like labor's legacy, love connects us to those far away.
Labor Day joy is complete when shared with all we love.
Like workers' spirit, love brings together all we hold dear.
